sentence.Network_cn: 你的意思我理解得对 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: Do I apprehend you aright , ie Do you mean what I think you mean?

sentence.Network_en: We always have time enough , if we will but use it aright.
sentence.Network_cn: 只要我们苌朴檬奔洌?陀涝恫怀钍奔洳还挥谩?
